bibl.title: Fragments of a Relief from Oxyrhynchus: Elements of Late Roman-Coptic Iconography and Styles.
bibl.note: Background. - Study of the fragments. - Iconographic elements. - Dionysus and Heracles in late Middle Egypt. - Other considerations. - Questions of style. - Recapitulation.
bibl.seg: Eva Subías Pascual, Fragments of a Relief from Oxyrhynchus: Elements of Late Roman-Coptic Iconography and Styles.
Journal of Coptic Studies 14 (2012) pp. 137-158 et 4 pll.
Background. - Study of the fragments. - Iconographic elements. - Dionysus and Heracles in late Middle Egypt. - Other considerations. - Questions of style. - Recapitulation.
